meanings.definition: The state of being awake and alert.
meanings.sent1: His wakefulness during the night kept him on high alert.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended improving sleep habits to increase wakefulness during the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat's wakefulness at 3 AM was not appreciated by its owner.
meanings.sent4: The wakefulness of the security guard prevented any unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent5: The wakefulness of the students during the exam was impressive.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wakeful.
meanings.sent1: Her wakefulness was evident as she greeted the sunrise each morning.
meanings.sent2: The baby's wakefulness at night made it challenging for the parents to get enough rest.
meanings.sent3: The wakefulness of the owl fascinated the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The wakefulness of the athlete before the competition showed their dedication.
meanings.sent5: The wakefulness of the dog alerted its owner to the approaching visitor.
